item.title: Israel-Iran live updates: B-2 bombers, Tomahawk cruise missiles used in Iran strike
item.description: President Donald Trump said the U.S. attacked three sites in Iran related to the country's nuclear program.

item.title: Trump said he was giving Iran a window to come to the table. He struck 2 days later.
item.description: He said Friday it would give time for Iranians to "come to their senses."

item.title: US hits 3 Iranian nuclear sites, Trump says, plunging America into conflict
item.description: The United States struck three nuclear sites in Iran on Saturday, plunging the U.S. into a battle waged over the past several days between Israel and ...

item.title: Trump admin live updates: JD Vance visits LA amid tension over immigration policies
item.description: Trump took to Truth Social Friday morning to again make unverified claims that the 2020 election was fraudulent and called for a special prosecutor.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
